name: UNDERSEA FIREFIGHTER!
description:
UNDERSEA FIREFIGHTER!

A game for RNDGAME 2021!

We didn't finish in time, as I had a vacation and illness during the  jam time, but we have most of the graphics done and will make this a cool game in the future.

Stay tuned!

Since we didn't finish -- I just put PICO ARCADE there as a placeholder.
